title: Rental in Las Vegas with Right to purchase an d open house Saturday
posting_body: Great home located in Las Vegas with 3 bedrooms and 2 baths open house this Saturday 10-1pm
Contact me to learn more about this innovative Lease with a Right to purchase program.
Unlike many lease to own programs, there is no obligation to buy and no non-refundable option fees.
I am doing a live seminar onsite at this property this weekend along with food, prizes, and a Q and A session.
45 Days from applying to move in day
*No history of eviction or other landlord issues
Great home located in Las Vegas with 3bedrooms and 2 baths
Contact me today for more information
